official_title: To designate the United States courthouse located in New Haven, Connecticut, as the "Richard C. Lee United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the United States courthouse located at 141 Church Street in New Haven, Connecticut, as the Richard C. Lee United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse located in New Haven, Connecticut, as the "Richard C. Lee United States Courthouse".
